narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Permanente Medical Group, Inc. is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Richmond, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $51.1M in Medicaid payments across 9.9M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $51.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
